message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product for $120. I believe it will be very valuable for you.
I'm interested in the product, but I think it's a bit pricey. Would you be willing to consider a price of $90?
I appreciate your interest, Bob.  While I value your offer, I'm looking for something closer to $110.  I believe this reflects the true value of the product.
I understand your perspective, but I'm still a bit hesitant about the price. Would you be willing to consider a price of $100?
